execution_quality: The agent conducted thorough searches and file inspection, but encountered multiple errors during execution and had to apply trial-and-error fixes rather than cleanly resolving the issue on first attempt.
work_category: Debugging task to locate the source of repeated configuration issues after system reconfiguration and doom emacs rebuild. Agent performed systematic searching and file inspection to trace the problem origin.
summary: The agent performed targeted debugging work to trace the source of configuration issues, executing multiple grep and glob searches followed by file inspection and a single edit. While the systematic approach was appropriate for the task, encountering 4 errors during execution and providing the user with findings rather than a complete resolution suggests the debugging was incomplete. The empty follow-up message is ambiguous—the user may be satisfied with the investigation or may be testing the proposed fix independently.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended without explicit completion message. User may be investigating the findings independently, or may return if the issue persists or is resolved.
